title: insta360
heading: insta360 X3 Action Camera, 1/2 Sensor, 5.7K 360 Capture, Optical Zoom 3X, 72 MP 360 Photo, 4K Single Lens Mode, Black
description: 72 MP 360 Photo, 360 photos just got a huge upgrade. Now capture 72 megapixel stills with more detail than ever before.

The magic of 360 capture is the ability to choose the best angle after the fact. Easy AI-powered reframing tools in the Insta360 app make it easy to find the perfect, so you’ll never miss a shot again.
1/2” Sensor Capture photos and videos with more detail thanks to a brand-new 1/2” sensor.
